titles.title: Minimum Wage Act of 2000
To amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to increase the minimum wage by $1 over 2 years.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Workforce Protections.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and the Workforce

bill.summary: 4/4/2000--Introduced. Minimum Wage Act of 2000 - Amends the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to increase the Federal minimum wage (currently $5.15 per hour) to: (1) $5.65 per hour during the year beginning July 1, 2000; and (2) $6.15 per hour beginning July 1, 2001.
